name: Dr. Sarah Collins
bio: Sarah focuses on creating winter-friendly diet plans to keep pets energetic and healthy.

name: Dr. Liam Turner
bio: Liam helps pets adapt to seasonal changes and prevent cold-related illnesses.

name: Dr. Emily Nguyen
bio: Emily ensures pets stay clean, comfortable, and injury-free during winter months.

name: Dr. Carlos Vega
bio: Carlos provides behavioral tips for keeping pets calm and cozy indoors during cold days.
